Literature.Title: Two optimized antimicrobial peptides with therapeutic potential for clinical antibiotic-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Li C, Zhu C, Ren B, Yin X, Shim SH, Gao Y, Zhu J, Zhao P, Liu C, Yu R, Xia X, Zhang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>640 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>640 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:25% Killing=640 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 5314(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans ATCC UA159(MIC=<64µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MIC=<64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 8325-4(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=32µg/ml)
